channel.title: Projects on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Rusty Eddy

item.title: RedEye Webapp ~ Front End
item.description: About The Image The image above depicts the RedEye camera running with the Motion Detection VideoPipeline Plugin. It is identifying and tracking moving objects within the video. About The Webapp This Webapp was written with the Vue.js Framework. It uses Bootstrap for styling up the web page. Single Page Application (SPA) The website is a true Single Page Application (SPA) using the Vue Router and Vuex for state management.

item.title: A MicroService Dashboard for MicroControllers
item.description: Written in vue Vuetify has been added to make it really pretty and use great components

item.title: An HTTP Server written in Go
item.description: HTML5 Websites Serves a web page routed in the ‘-pub’ path. If path is empty, it will serve up an in-memory page, meaning you will get a web page regardless of whether you provide a filesystem or not. Serve HTML Websites To run the static website directly from memory do this: % spa If you want to run a specific website that contains a directory with an index.html file in it, we can serve that up like this:
